FAQ / Wave 1 / Battle Cards /
View On Teletraan1.net

Fusion Cannon of Megatron

  1. Can I put this on characters other than Megatron? [Source: WotC]
    Yes. The Upgraded character will get the +1 attack bonus, although it won’t get Pierce 3.
  2. Post WotC: Allied Crossplay
    Optimus Prime - Dark Awakening     [Source: World|Strike FAQ]
    In bot mode, Optimus Prime, Dark Awakening gains the benefits of his faction Upgrade ability as long as the faction Upgrades on him aren’t Autobot or Quintesson.
    As of this (FAQ's) writing, these are all the faction Upgrades that Optimus Prime, Dark Awakening can utilize to buff your team.
    Autobot:

    • Any Autobot Upgrade, though Noble’s Blaster also has a [G] pip


    Decepticon:

    • Electro-Optical Visor

    • Energon Mace

    • Fusion Cannon of Megatron

    • Hazardous Shield

    • Null-Ray of Starscream


    Mercenary:

    • Black Mail (Wave BFA)

    • Dutch (Wave BFA)

    • Subcontractor Agreement (Wave BFA)

    • Valuable Contract


    Quintesson:

    • Any valid Quintesson Upgrade
